titleInfo.title: USA v. MC NISH et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT AS TO SHACOY MC NISH (1), Count(s) 10sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 2-5, 9,13,16,17,18,20,22,24 AND 26), SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; Count(s) 11sss, 15sss, DISMISSED ON GOVERNMENT'S MOTION; Count(s) 12sss, 19sss, 1sss, IMPRISONMENT: 60 MONTHS, SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 YEARS; Count(s) 13sss, 16sss, 17sss-18sss, 24sss, 26sss, 2sss-4sss, IMPRISONMENT: 120 MONTHS, SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 YEARS; Count(s) 14sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 2-5, 9,13,16,17,18,20,22,24 AND 26), SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; Count(s) 21sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 2-5, 9,13,16,17,18,20,22,24 AND 26), SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; Count(s) 22sss, 5sss, 9sss, IMPRISONMENT: 120 MONTHS, SUPERVISED RELEASE: 5 YEARS; Count(s) 23sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 2-5, 9,13,16,17,18,20,22,24 AND 26), SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; Count(s) 25sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 2-5, 9,13,16,17,18,20,22,24 AND 26), SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; Count(s) 27sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (12 MONTHS CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 6,10,14,21,23, 25; 12 MONTHS CONCURRENT TO COUNTS 6,10,14,21,23,25 - TOTAL TERM: 156 MONTHS) SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; Count(s) 6sss, IMPRISONMENT: 24 MONTHS (CONSECUTIVE TO COUNTS 2-5, 9,13,16,17,18,20,22,24 AND 26), SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 YEAR; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $2300, RESTITUTION: $58,984.01 AS TO ALL COUNTS.. Signed by HONORABLE BERLE M. SCHILLER on 11/9/2011.11/10/2011 Entered and Copies Mailed, E-Mailed by Chambers. (ap, ) Modified on 11/10/2011 (ap, ).
